website_summaries.verdict: The Roav is a rare best-in-class device that includes a hefty feature set that can easily be controlled from any smartphone.
pros: The built-in Sony wide-angle lens records up to four lanes of traffic
the temperature-resistant frame means it can withstand just about any climate
cons: The suction cup attachment system is an odd choice for a car camera at this price point
we would have preferred a more robust attachment method

customer_reviews.title: had problems
customer_reviews.text: I am an Anker fan, so it was disappointing dealing with customer support on this product. I used the toll-free number, and even though the person was polite, he was not able to do anything except open a case. Apparently support is in Asia, and they take about 24 hours to respond to an email. Long story short is after upgrading the firmware (it happened to come out in the interim), my device works again. In other words, I took it upon myself to upgrade the firmware, it was not suggested by support. If this product had costed $35, then ok it's disposable and just get another, but it cost a lot more than that. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and android app worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed just to the right of my rearview mirror (Hyundai Santa Fe) and used the tool provided to push the power cord under the headliner and out of sight. The android app worked flawlessly and provides easy access to all recordings without the hassle of ejecting the SD card and inserting it into your computer. I love how the app allows you to change any of the settings on the camera. Only "wishlist" would be for extending the power during Parking mode. Otherwise, I am thrilled with the performance of this unit and the quality of the video.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Clearwater, FL

customer_reviews.title: Anker doesn't just do batteries anymore
customer_reviews.text: The South FL sun has not put a damper on this battery powered, plug-in camera. Crystal clear HD images day or night, parking mode if you want it, and easily viewable recordings via the app. The only issue, and from my understanding it's a Google/Android issue, is the somewhat slow transfer speed of videos via the app. Update: After using it a few months there has been no degradation of quality. I actually captured an accident where a pedestrian was hit by a vehicle while crossing illegally (both parties were fine) and my footage helped the police determine fault. Still recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Doug O.

customer_reviews.title: Steep learning curve, for some.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera; for the more experience pro, it takes good pictures. Many feature that will keep you entertained. Go for GP Your pictures can only be shared with YouTube or Farcebook. They made a deal with them for $$$$, to screw over users No bluetooth, no email or Google+!! In other words, it is nothing more than an extension of Tube and Farcebook! Can dowload to cellphone, using their app, then share to computer via blue tooth. Excellent camera with a few shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: Burke WWII Vet

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but not the best mount
customer_reviews.text: Good camera quality and seems to be very durable in hot weather. The only issue I have is that the suction cup stopped sticking and would keep falling off during drives. Tried using an adhesive pad to get it to stick but no luck. I really wish there was an alternate way to get the dashcam attached to the glass. *Update* I spoke with Roav support and they helped ensure that I had a working GPS mount and provided alternative solutions in the event of an issue. 5 stars for the great service!
customer_reviews.author: QuincyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of use, we have been completely happy with this dash cam. We were looking for a camera that had both dual cameras and wifi, but could not satisfy both of those requirements, so went with this WiFi model. It has been super and the iOS app is easy to use and shows great information along with the video. After 4 months, the suction cup broke. I contacted Roav to see if I could purchase another one. Adam was the contact through chat. No hassles. He was quick to solve the problem and I should have a new assembly in 3 to 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Proactive customer service
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup didnt hold the camera , was contacted by anker customer service, they were very proactive in resolving my issues. They offered to send out 3M mounts to replace the suction cup.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Best dash cam, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be any happier with this camera performance. The video quality is so good and the connectivity with the phone is so smooth. Night video quality is not the greatest but it's definetly much better than other dash cams I owned before. Since the camera has a built in GPS I wish the manufacter included the ability to track it with the phone, in case the car gets stolen you know where it is, or even to find your car on a big parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lara

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who drives Semi Truck all over the country. This dash cam has great I mean great day and night picture. It records the hole road and you can turn the sound on or off. The video saves every 10 minutes or less if u like. I defiantly would recommend this Dash Cam. It's a must have for a Semi Truck Driver.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bryan

customer_reviews.title: suction cup quality is really really poor.
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup is not holding the camera anymore to the windshield. The camera keep falling off and messed up the tint on my windshield...The camera itself is excellent.. but the suction cup quality is really really poor. Will only last up to 2 or 3 weeks before it start falling off the windshield..
customer_reviews.author: Officer E

customer_reviews.title: Warranty sucks
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice camera but recently it stops working after 10 months and warranty claim process is extremely difficult i would get it next time to a local store like Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make sure to get a dashcam with GPS so I could also record speed. This unit does that and more. In addition to the high quality video with the easy to use app you can actually see a map of your route when you play back the video. Well worth an extra few bucks. I am extremely happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Evans

customer_reviews.title: Add was is leading!! Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Add said it has GPS . It would track the car anywhere it gose. I couldn’t get it to work. Called tech support the man said the add was miss leading.. It dose not track the car and Welcome me to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Doris Holder

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and Love the Smartphone connection capability
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in minutes. What I like most is the interface with my iPhone. I was able to quickly review videos, easily delete unneeded videos, and change settings with ease using the Roav app. I will be buying another. Update: I liked this Dash Cam and its interface so much that I bought another one for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does not record when connected to app.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, great picture quality. What I dont like is that the camera stops recording when you connect the app. I guess I should have read every review maybe I would have found that info. If I had found it I would not have bought this camera.
customer_reviews.author: MCAJ bvdse

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality of the product. Also great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this dash cam for about a year since I commute to work throughout the week. The video quality during the day/night is great and license plates are easily visible (I'll upload videos if I remember). The suction power is pretty good. Just don't depend on it during the summer if you live in a hot area. Also, I had issues with my device about 1-2 weeks ago. I contacted customer support and I was welcomed with a quick and understanding reply. Customer support gave me the help I needed in a short amount of time. Thank you customer support. Overall, I'm happy with the product and I don't see myself getting a different dashcam.
customer_reviews.author: Sir. Vive

customer_reviews.title: Defective suction cup out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup was defective out of the box. It does not stick to the glass AT ALL, even without the camera attached to it. There are two indentions in the cup and it is slightly deformed so I'm assuming they are the culprit. This is really disappointing because I've always received great products from Anker, but I'm hoping their customer service can help me out.
customer_reviews.author: DisturbedOne

customer_reviews.title: Love my Roav
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty good fanboi for Anker products and this is no different. Exceeded all my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction won’t stay up.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the way the camera records but it keeps falling off even after remounting it properly. Suction to the windshield is poor and falls off at least monthly which is pretty annoying. We ordered two cameras for 2 separate cars and the sand thing keeps happening in both cars.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard R Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ive had dash cams that cost twice as much, not even half as good as this. 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Chin S.

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nextbase 612GW 4k HD Dash Cam. I love it! I bought the Roav dash cam for my other car. Boy was I disappointed!! The quality of the video and the operation does not come even close to the Nextbase. If the sun is on the Dashcam it makes the image streaky and the wide angle shows the side parts of the window frame . I would not buy another one of these cameras. My mistake. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MacArtist3

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, save your money.
customer_reviews.text: poor camera. I’m on my 4th replacement which came with a broken LCD and was told since it’s out of warranty and it’s already been replaced multiple times I’m stuck with it. Save your money!! 2 instances where I needed video for police the camera has failed. Today, one of our employees was assaulted and tried pulling video only to find it frozen in my truck and not recording.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Falls off the windshield daily. Weak suction cup.
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically a big fan of Anker products, but the unit I received falls off the windshield daily. Every morning I get into the car to see it hanging by the USB cable (which I tucked into the headliner). Otherwise it seems like it works reasonably well. It would have been nice if they provided additional mounting options in addition to the suction cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an upgrade from my old dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the last one I had. This has all the features you need in a dash cam. Kevin at Roav reached out to me a few weeks after purchasing and wanted feedback. I can’t say enough about how nice this unit is.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Vogler

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: New car, wanted to capture the idiocy of other drivers in case of disaster. Roav mounts right up, wire tucks neatly in the headliner, and the USB port is only powered when ignition is on, so all automatic. Simple to use, and the video quality is great and a very wide angle.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, excellent quality, amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera!! I love the WiFi connection feature because I can retrieve footage right from my car instead of removing the memory card and plugging it into my computer. Customer service is excellent!! I had an issue With my camera, Cherry helped me in no time ensuring my concerns were met with expeditiously. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ZEE5075

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - Barely lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Poor suction. If its too hot or too cold it falls off (I live in NYC so its not that extreme) . Wonky hard ti use software to view recordings, failure to play back on various occasions including when a stone hit my windshield (fortunately it didn't do any damage) and after just over a year I can't use it anymore because the pin that holds in place to connect to the suction holder broke. You can do a lot better than this overpriced junk.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Hershman

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a problem with the suction mounting. One contact with their customer service (Vanessa) and they immediately sent a replacement mount. My issue was never with the camera. It takes very good videos. The replacement mount makes me one satisfied buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Offshoresailor

customer_reviews.title: Most disappointing product by Anker
customer_reviews.text: I had loved products by Anker for the past few years. I bought this dashcam hoping it will be as good as their other products such as chargers, cables and headsets. This was an utter disappointment. For a pricetag of 150 USD, the recording is terrible. They don't show legible number plates in any weather, day or night. There are other cameras that can provide this quality at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Sach

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money that didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and two keep losing power. The worst case scenario occurred when a car accident happened and it had not recorded for 30 minutes. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly. They recommend mounting to the right of the review mirror, but I moved mine to just underneath it and it eliminates the slight viewing angle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cam, easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: I've had the product for about 9 months now, and thankfully I haven't had to use it for an accident. The quality of the footage is great and the camera is super easy to use and it's easy to download clips onto your phone via bluetooth. During the summer (80s-90s degrees F) the suction mount began to fail and I would find my camera dangling. I messaged Anker to ask for a replacement (since I've had it less than a year) and they were able to provide one for free and it's holding up so far. Great customer service and great camera. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Granda

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit, clear and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It took a total of 3 minutes to setup and start using. The app is an awesome touch. Picture quality is very good you can make out plate numbers if needed.
customer_reviews.author: andrew Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality camera and very good customer service. Camera app is easy to use, camera interface is intuitive and the video quality is very good. This is my third camera and I like this the best. I had a Goluk T2 and when problems cropped up, customer service was zero. Then I had a Garmin 55 that needed proprietary wiring and it would not work with my existing micro USB. Ridiculous. This camera was plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: peter b

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dash cam for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is absolutely fantastic, its night vision is clear and more vibrant that it actually is outside, it's well built and great against shock. Over all I'm pleased with the performance of this cam and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Good Dashcam
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dashcam and I am very happy with it. I had a minor issue connecting to my Galaxy S9 but customer service was great and replaced the unit which has been working great. Installation was very simple just had to plug it into the USB port and it turns on automatically with the car. Anytime I want to view a video I just open the app on my phone which has an option to download and the user interface is good and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic overall dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the features this has the best one is being able to transfer the videos from the camera to your phone. The only drawback is that it can be rather slow especially if you’re farther than a foot or two from it.
customer_reviews.author: FlagrantBacon94

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good function
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. The transfer speed is slow when using WIFI. I haven't tried plugging the device into my PC to transfer the files directly but if I need to pull multiple videos from the device I'll have to do that. Otherwise, it works well. The app is easy to use. Video quality appears to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Best night vision, WiFi and video quality
customer_reviews.text: I drive tow trucks heavy duty, light duty and we haul heavy equipment on trailers. I work nights most of the time. It’s the best camera ever. The quality of the video is great, night vision is very clear. Tried several others during the past couple of years and they don’t come close to it in quality. Transferring the video to my iPhone is quick and easy and the video quality stays the same. Best app and WiFi. Really happy!.
customer_reviews.author: walt

customer_reviews.title: Order it. Your be happy you did!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything it says it is. I was blown away with the clarity. Captures everything and easy install. My husband was very happy when he noticed how professional a job I did, lol. We are now ordering two more. One for our other truck and one for our soon to be student driver. I can view his drive, the music and speed. This product is amazing. I’m so happy with it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Croslow

customer_reviews.title: This dash cam works!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This dash cam works. Very easy to install and just plug it in and it works. The unit has reserved battery life so if the car is moved after its turned off, the camera will capture footage, looks like 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in the suction cup on this camera. It stayed for about 3 weeks. Now, no matter what temperature it sticks for about 3-5 minutes and immediately falls off. The camera itself is good and I have no complaints. But the quality of the camera is pointless if it won’t stay attached to the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Video
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and love the picture quality. Suction works much better then I thought. I suggest getting at least a 64gb chip to keep this camera going strong. I am sad though I cant hide the charging cord.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Feature rich Dashcam
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Dashcam for about a week now. I have a tablet mounted in my truck that stays connected to the camera at all times. The Wifi and GPS work great so far. After installing the app and setting up the camera (about 15 minutes) I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 6 months. Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in 6 months. Not intuitive at all. Thoroughly dissatisfied with an Anchor product. Didn’t expect this after spending $$$.
customer_reviews.author: RAMBAL

customer_reviews.title: Great company.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, especially when you get it on a sale price. This is my 3rd purchase, now all my cars are outfitted. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SlumLord

customer_reviews.title: Everything is there
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of set up and it was complete! However...ive had two incidents and both were NOT recorded! So far, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace a failed z3; wifi interface with phone is great feature allowing review of video. gps tagging is a nice option. only disappointment is downloading video to phone is slower than expected.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: its good dash cam
customer_reviews.text: well this camera got good features like wifi . but the quality when zoom in hardly you can see the plate for the front car, at least in my country since the number and letters are small . but still where is the 1080p ,goes with the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Aziz. A. albarr

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: A little concerned that the product looked like it has already been opened and repackaged. I'll be using it for the next few weeks to see if functionality is affected and I might be sending this back if the slightest hint of that is showing.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Subject 0

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, worthless mount
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camera, but the suction mount does not hold for very long, especially through temperature changes. Camera has fallen multiple times while driving, and every time over night. I've tried mounting on a silicone pad, and that didn't improve things. Trying to find a solution with some double stick pads, but not holding hope. This would be a 5 star product if the mount system worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C.

customer_reviews.title: awesome for protection
customer_reviews.text: It helps me when people run across the street when not at the crosswalk so police can give the pedestrian a ticket J-walking to show I'm not at fault for near missing the person running across in New Jersey
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Improve the suction cup to prevent it from losing its suction.
customer_reviews.text: I generally use the camera in the event of an accident. The only complaint I have is the suction cup does not hold when the weather changes. I've had to reapply the cup to my windshield several times.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very good front view camera for a car. Auto on, very good quality images.
customer_reviews.text: Auto on, good image quality, suction cup fails to stick occasionally, but use a drop of water before mounting on the windshield and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Roav customer support
customer_reviews.text: The product had a problem with the suction mount after 1 month and I contacted ROAV who took care of the issue and because of their great customer support, I received a new Mount within 1 week. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KGaffney

customer_reviews.title: Great dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice dash cam, app works great camera works great. No real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: markus knows

customer_reviews.title: Download problem
customer_reviews.text: Ok dash camera.... I just had a problem when trying to download the videos. It started to download and when its almost completed, the screen goes black and return me to the homepage.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than the listed price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this while it was on a prime deal and it has been worth every penny. The picture quality is phenomenal day and night. It's so easy to connect to your phone and view videos and delete them to spare space. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a amazing dash cam at a decent price. I am very happy with this purchase. Would recommend to anyone looking for a dash camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lizznoellek

customer_reviews.title: Great dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dashcam. Great clarity, easy to review and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the C2 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is amazing. The ability to connect via wifi to download a clip and share to YouTube and/or Facebook makes this dashcam a cut above the others.
customer_reviews.author: kaybegod

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Workes as expected. Love the wifi capability to view/download videos to phone. Quality is decent for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: britchika

customer_reviews.title: Good dash cam for trucker
customer_reviews.text: Good dash cam with good picture quality, night vision is also good, it has WiFi which u can use to connect to your phone and use Roav app to check videos instantly. Also it has build in gps tracker
customer_reviews.author: Alijon Irnazarov

customer_reviews.title: Very good dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Very good dashcam i highly recommend. The built in WIFI makes the life very easy to import the videos. Impressive cideo quality . I hope if they can keep the GPS route even if the video is deleted
customer_reviews.author: Yassine Bihi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It has better picture then when you’re looking out the windshield! It’s easy to use and really does capture everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great video quality and great support
customer_reviews.text: The camera is my 3rd dash cam and easily the best video quality. I had a few questions which were answered extremely fast. Great product, great price, great service.
customer_reviews.author: G. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great product,,
customer_reviews.text: Everybody should have this dashboard camera 👍🏼👍🏼 ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ It’s so clear,, 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻😀
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Died in 3 months, even changed memory cards. Suction cup doesn't suck, literally. Wish I had kept my money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great all around camera.  Interface with iPhone is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Would like to have either email or text alerts with Parking Collision Detection. Quick response with video is important.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S

customer_reviews.title: Streams to phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the picture quality and how easy it is to save videos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use and love being able to connect to my phone with the built in wifi.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Roav dash cam
customer_reviews.text: It works good I don't have any issues with it it comes unstuck off the window on hot days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot
customer_reviews.text: Not great if u want to capture license plates or peoples faces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Suction cup didn't work well glued it to glass wlw
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but a few issues...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for dash cam recording. Suction cup mount is very weak for weather changes and initial charging cable is weak. Usually falls once or twice a month from dash. Can’t purchase better suction cup or additional mount separately so you’re stuck purchasing new unit if it falls and breaks.
customer_reviews.author: jdyson83

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate instructions, performance not as promised
customer_reviews.text: This came with an SD card, but no instructions on how to format it. Cam keeps telling me to format SD, but don't know how. A plastic tool came with this cam that is supposedly to be used to hide the cord, but again, no instructions. Dash Cam notes on my smart phone, android, that it is not tethered, no wifi, disconnected, but I have wifi on, up and running perfectly fine, so I can't understand why this is not functioning as promised.the suction mount is weak and inadequate, with the camera falling off the windshield all to frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean Cole

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars, I only had my camera up for 2 days when an accident happened in front of me. I was a witness to this accident and my camera also recorded the it. I showed the officer the recording and he asked if I would email him the video for his report. However, there are only two options to share recordings, Facebook or utube. I contacted customer service and this person really didn't have any knowledge about how to share. My last camera I could email directly from the app. I finally have learned how to email a video, but it takes a lot longer for me with this app. overall it is a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tradewinds

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor documentation
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy installation. Poor documentation. For some reason, Anker/Roav believes in minimal information. One of those situations where you read the doc and then play with the equipment to see how things really work. Still trying to figure out the buttons on the camera for accessing features. Via the phone app, I'll give it a 3 star as well. Most of the time it works OK, but sometimes it has WiFi issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Margoscin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this a better review, but this does not work well in the desert of Southern California. The heat jsut causes too many glitches and issues. I do not have the patience to deal with removing this and putting it back every time I get in and out of my truck. I need an device that can handle 150 degrees F and - 20 F without having to carry it with me to protect it. Sorry guys, this is not a recommended device.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B

customer_reviews.title: I am not able to protect myself!!! It didn't record specific parts!!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't record specific parts!!! It works fine all other days but this time no record there!! Someone didn't turn on turn signals, and I went through.. that's why I need to save videos. When I open roav... check April 26, 2019... only 3 videos?? What?? It didn't record I was driving. The only videos are like start to drive and arrive home in 30 sec on specific this hell day!!!! The other days are fine and have full records... That's silly perfect time.
customer_reviews.author: apology guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Decision DashCam for Long Researcher!!
customer_reviews.text: If you've researched, and been on youtube, for hours looking at Dash Cams under 200 or under 150 .. then from all my searching, I decided to buy this for 119 (because amazon had a coupon) and it was a great decision. Great Picture Mileage and GPS location doesn't show on the screen BUT DOES show on the recorded play back... And what really mad me buy this is this was the best dashcam with a suction cup. Because I'm not a person that can stick it one time in the right place.. I admire the folks that can ... Search Over .. Get this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larnell

customer_reviews.title: The best dashcam currently available.
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Instant access to your clips. Easy sharing. Great quality video. I would definitely like to see a way for the app to put video clips to a secondary location, such as an sd card. But that is an app, not the camera. Absolutely the best dashcam I have owned. Does everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Simply AMAZING customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this review 5 stars, but it wasn't necessarily for the dash cam. I had issues with the original and the replacement. The real star of this review is Ashley in the Anker / Roav customer satisfaction group. OMG, this lady went above and beyond to ensure I was happy with their product. I can't say enough good things about Ashley! As long as this company continues to offer exceptional customer service, I'll continue to support them.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. After about one year the suction cup released from the windshield and the camera fell to the dash. The suction cup locking mechanism broke internally and would not apply suction any more. We contacted customer service and they immediately responded by sending a replacement mounting bracket. They were very responsive and stand behind their products. very pleased with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Survived one Louisiana summer, hoping for many more.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few dash mounted items with batteries in them. Our South Louisiana heat and sun easily kill rechargeable batteries in units like this. I'm happy to say the ROAV has passed one full Louisiana summer with flying colors. The unit works great and so do the two others I bought. One caveat. If the unit falls from the windshield or you take a good bump I found that the screen will flash on and off at random. Resetting the microSD memory card (push out, push in) solved that issue.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, but not so good product
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Let me start by saying Roav has great customer service. However, after multiple replacements, I had the same issue. The camera works well for a month or so, then turns off and on every few minutes. The only reason I’m giving two stars is because Roav has great customer service. They sent me a replacement every time. I really hope they improve their products. Original review: Great dash cam. Picture quality is pretty good (though I do feel it could be better for the price). I did have some issues, but Roav did send a free replacement, as part of their warranty. Overall, I do recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Paulster

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, so far so good. I don't have to park in the sun very often so seems to be holding up. Lion batteries don't like the heat but not a problem so far. App works right out the box and saves dismounting to view video. easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Boogieman

customer_reviews.title: Local WiFi access from within the vehicle
customer_reviews.text: You can select how often a video segment captures street video. Ours is set to 2 minute loops, to make it much easier to locate the portion of a drive where the Elk jumped out in front of your vehicle. The simple and short video loops are preferred to making a loop of 3 hrs, for example.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera, but Extremely Limited Features
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about how the camera performs, but there are no updates to the software and the functionality of the camera is quite limited. If you want a good basic, inexpensive camera, this is a good camera for you. However, if you want cool features, keep looking...
customer_reviews.author: gwh731

customer_reviews.title: This Dashcam Got me 32000 dollars
customer_reviews.text: So you may ask how? Simple I was in an accident and this amazing dashcam caught it all on tape. Hit and run drivers beware this dashcam will get your plates easy and your face. These days protect yourself I would have not received a penny if I didn't have this dashcam. This is the best investment I ever made 5/5 clearness and will get someones plate very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Edelstein

customer_reviews.title: Works great - plug and play really.
customer_reviews.text: I have a long commute and have always wanted a dash cam. Did some research and decided to get this. I have other anker products and this cam is definitely worth its price. It’s easy to set up, the built in WiFi is great. Great picture quality. You really can’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: PSG

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a $500 deductible 2 days after I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Got hit on the left side, doing a perfect left turn in a busy intersection. The camera caught me doing the perfect turn and the sound of the hit. It was enough for the insurance company to agree I had no fault in the matter even though the other driver claimed I cut them off. Now, I never, ever drive without it. ps. the quality is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: MPT

customer_reviews.title: Not good for zooming in license plate
customer_reviews.text: If you want a footage of the road and traffic, it does the job. However, if you need to zoom in for license plate incase of accident or for evidence purposes, this is NOT the camera you would want. This one is definitely going to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: JPL

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a decent unit. The app works well. Good video
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with mine after a few months but they sent me a replacement which works fine. Seems like a decent unit and company
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fahmie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product has been working great. I damaged the suction mount and asked their support about receiving a replacement mount. Their support team was responsive and very helpful. They even took the time to make sure that I had received my replacement after it had been shipped. Roav/Anker continues to impress me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. All features work great. Hard to pick up license plate numbers and for that reason alone I give it a 4 star. All other intended uses work as advertised. Accurate GPS and Speed readings.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Really like how it sinks to my phone for reviewing Video. The suction cup let go a couple times when the car was Super Hot but it’s not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest G.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Dashcame
customer_reviews.text: its a very nice dashcame i use it for long time more than a year i gives you a very clear wide picture but it so difficult to see car plate number
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Bu-Hilal

customer_reviews.title: WiFi camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup great picture easy to download video. Haven’t found out how to change the mph to miles per hour. Best camera I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: anthony kempf

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup is useless
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, wifi works great. I suggest you go ahead an buy the mirror mount, the suction cup is pitiful.
customer_reviews.author: CCCjr

customer_reviews.title: Always choose ankar
customer_reviews.text: Always been and ankar fan. Theirs is the only brand that lasts the true test of time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Corn

product_meta.title: Roav by Anker Dash Cam C2 Pro with FHD 1080p, Sony Starvis Sensor, 4-Lane Wide-Angle Lens, GPS Logging, Built-in Wi-Fi, and Dedicated App, G-Sensor, WDR, Loop Recording, Night Mode
product_meta.description: DashCam C2 Pro Capture the Unexpected From Roav—Making the smart driving experience accessible to all • A collection of connected in-car devices that enhances your driving experience • Created by the same team as Anker—renowned for exceptional quality and innovation Total Night-Vision A cutting-edge Sony Starvis sensor and NightHawk technology combine to provide incredible nighttime clarity. Record license plates of speeding cars up to 30 feet away in low-light conditions. Rich, Clear Video Capture every drive in remarkably crisp 1080p high-definition with an advanced chipset, 5 lens elements, and Wide Dynamic Range image balancing. Wide-Angle View An f2.0 wide-angle aperture lens captures 4 lanes of traffic at once. See the whole road, not just the car in front of you. Extreme Temperature Resistance A steel frame disperses heat away from internal circuits for reliable performance in nearly any climate. DashCam C2 Pro operates in temps ranging from -4°F to 158°F when plugged in or from 32°F to 158°F on battery power. Worry-Free Warranty Roav has total confidence in our products and backs them with a 12-month warranty. Roav will replace any defective product with a brand-new one within 12 months of purchase, no questions asked.
feature_bullets: Total Night-Vision: A cutting-edge Sony Starvis sensor and NightHawk technology deliver superior performance to clearly capture speeding license plates—day or night.

Rich, Clear Video: An advanced chipset, 5 lens elements, and Wide Dynamic Range image balancing combine to record every drive in crisp 1080p. Use the dedicated Roav app to manage and download your recorded videos.
See the Whole Road: Equipped with an f2.0 wide-angle aperture lens to simultaneously view 4 lanes of traffic.

Extreme Temperature Resistance: Designed with a steel frame to disperse heat away from internal circuits. When plugged in: Operates in -4°F-158°F. Using battery power (for the parking monitor): Operates at 32°F-158°F.

What You Get:Roav DashCam C2 Pro,Trim Removal Tool,Suction and 3M Sticker Mounts,User Manual,Happy Card,our 12-month product replacement warranty and friendly customer service.Note: Operation requires a 32GB Class 10 microSD card or better (not included).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars345 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Roav DashCam C2 Pro, 32GB Samsung microSD Card, Trim Removal Tool, Suction Mount, User Manual, Happy Card
